desc: Here at the Angelic Teapot, we offer a large selection of teas from around the world. We believe that Fair Trade, Ethical Business Practice and Organic Production are all vital to the health and well-being of everyone on the planet. We do our best to offer teas produced with these standards whenever possible.

layout.text:
Premium Tea, Herbs, Spices
ENRICHING LIVES ONE TEACUP AT A TIME
Est. 2010 in the Heart of White Rock, BC. Canada
